title: Neele Neele Ambar Par
lyrics:
Nile nile anbar par chaand jab ae
Pyaar barasaae, ham ko tarasaae
Aisa koi saathi ho, aisa koi premi ho
Pyaas dil ki bujha jaae

Unche unche parabat jab chumate hain anbar ko
Pyaasa pyaasa anbar jab chumata hai saagar ko
Pyaar se kasane ko, baahon men basane ko
Dil mera lalachaae, koi to a jaae
Aisa koi saathi ho, aisa koi premi ho
Pyaas dil ki bujha jaae

Thhnde thhnde jhonke jab baalon ko sahalaaye
Tapati tapati kiranen jab gaalon ko chhu jaae
Saanson ki garmi ko, haathon ki narmi ko
Mera man tarasaae, koi to chhu jaae
Aisa koi saathi ho, aisa koi premi ho
Pyaas dil ki bujha jaae

Chham chham karata saawan bundo ke baan chalaaye
Satarngi barasaaton men jab tanaman bhiga jaae
Pyaar men nahaane ko, dub hi jaane ko
Dil mera tadpaae, khwaab jaga jaae
Aisa koi saathi ho, aisa koi premi ho
Pyaas dil ki bujha jaae
tab: Neele Neele Ambar Par - The Movie

title: Sukh Ke Sab Saathi Dukh Mein Na Koi
lyrics: Sukh Ke Sab Saathi Dukh Mein Na Koi

title: Pal Pal Dil Ke Pass
lyrics:
Pal pal dil ke paas tum rehti ho
Jeevan meethi pyaas yeh kehti ho
Pal pal dil ke paas tum rehti ho
Har shyam aankhon par
Tera aanchal lehraye
Har raat yaadon ki
Baarat le aaye
Maein saans leta hoon
Teri khushboo aati hai
Ek mehka mehka sa 
Paigham laati hai
Meri dil ki dhadkan bhi
Tere geet gaati hai
Pal pal
Tum sochogi kyon itna 
Maein tumse pyaar karoon
Tum samjhogi deewana
Maein bhi iqraar karoon
Dewaanon ki yeh baatein
Deewane jaante hain
Jalne mei kya mazaa hai
Parwanr jaante hain
Tum yunhi jalate rehna
Aa aakar khwabon mein
Pa l pal
tab: Pal Pal Dil Ke Pass - Gaane

title: Crime Patrol
lyrics: In Todayâ€™s episode, we are going to deal with a human trafficking case which is very active in several parts of a city like Mumbai. This story begins with the aspirations of Anita, who is a married woman and she has an extreme desire to have all the expensive jewelry and other beauty
